document: <sentence id="s1" text="We report a new (fifth) patient with the cblJ disorder who presented at 7 days of age with poor feeding, hypotonia, methylmalonic aciduria, and elevated plasma homocysteine and harbored the mutations c.1667_1668delAG [p.Glu556Glyfs*27] and c.1295GAAAAA [p.Arg432Gln] in the li>ABCD4 gene.">
